credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
title: Carved sarcophagus with peacocks, grapevines, and symbols.
marks: Verso: frame sketch in pencil by Charles (?) Prendergast
description: photograph. Sarcophagus reads: "HIC REQVIESC IT IN PACE THEODORVS V.B. ARCHEPISCOVS"
